title: Assisted Living
description: In space, you can never have too much fresh fruit.  Or can you? Flower, the sentient alien colony ship on loan to EarthCent has a problem. Operating at just five percent of her capacity, she needs to attract more humans and give them a reason to stay. Join Harry, Irene, Julie and Bill for the fun in this sequel to Independent Living that shows youâ€™re never too old to teach an alien AI a new trick.
author: E.M. Foner
